function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited network and database setups for smart cities","Impact":"Inadequate data for effective decision-making and city management","Mitigation":"Invest in infrastructure for network and database setups, improve data collection and storage processes","Technologies":"Data management systems, network infrastructure, IoT devices","People":"City residents, stakeholders in urban planning","Owner":"City governments, urban planners"},{"Description":"Reliance on skewed data for decision-making","Impact":"Inaccurate insights and poor representation of knowledge","Mitigation":"Adopt 5G technology, improve data collection and analysis methods","Technologies":"5G wireless technology, advanced data analytics","People":"City residents, data analysts, urban planners","Owner":"Technology providers, data analysis experts"},{"Description":"Dependency on quality network for smart city sustainability","Impact":"Disruption of smart city operations and services","Mitigation":"Invest in 5G technology, regular maintenance and upgrades of network infrastructure","Technologies":"5G wireless technology, network maintenance tools","People":"City residents, municipal authorities, technology providers","Owner":"City governments, technology companies"}]}
